title: Submission templates and examples
description: 経験の浅い起業家は、良いものがどのようなものか、十分な例を持っていないかもしれません。

f6_assessments.q0: The principle of this idea is sound. However the proposal lacks detail on what the templates would be focusing on and where they would draw their information from.
f6_assessments.q1: Whilst the plan to produce some templates is relatively simple, it is not clear the proposer has the experience in creating templates of this sort. Successful implementation requires deep experience in successful proposal creation. It would also be good to have a breakdown of the budget and what it would be spent on.
f6_assessments.q2:
Whilst a timeline has been provided, there is no clear deliverables in terms of the number and content of the templates. Will there be different templates for different types of challenges? Some challenges are to create self sustaining businesses, others are to assist current community efforts or build a one off tool. There is unlikely to be a one size fits all approach here. 
Metrics for measuring success and associated goals for the project should be provided.

f6_assessments.q0: No information/screenshots are added to help understand it so the proposal remains very abstract.
f6_assessments.q1: The proposer team states that it has the necessary experience. However, they did not provide any links or references to support this statement
f6_assessments.q2: The proposer provides a step-by-step plan for the implementation with clear milestones and a defined time horizon

f6_assessments.q0: The idea of this proposal to provide less experienced entrepreneurs with templates and best practices of working proposals meets the critesria of this challenge. A step by step procedure will surely help future entrepreneurs to enhance the quality of their proposals.
f6_assessments.q1: The Proposer, as described, has many years of experience in the areas relevant to this proposal and operates a Cardano Staking Pool. It would certainly help this assessment if the concrete experience of the person or team were shown in more detail. The link provided leads to the Stake Pool, but there is little information about the operator. The detailed description of the deliverables and the procedure is very well thought out and, from my experience, indicates corresponding knowledge in the relevant area. In my opinion, these details and the realistic cost estimate offer a high probability of successful implementation.
f6_assessments.q2: The roadmap described seems very realistic and can be used to track progress. The defined key figures also provide a basis for measuring the success of the implementation.

f6_assessments.q0: I was surprised when I saw this kind of proposal because I think there are plenty of proposal resources available. There is a proposal guide on Cardano Catalyst Community Site which covers all necessary topics. Also a young inexperienced entrepreneurs targeted with this templates should do their research (nobody will do that for you). Examples of successful past submissions I believe can be also found as well as present ones on the website. Having said the above, I disagree with the problem statement that there is not sufficient materials from which proposers can learn and compose their own proposal.
f6_assessments.q1: The team member is unidentified, step-by-step roadmap is very vague and the spending of requested funds is not explained. With all the information given, many important questions remain unanswered, so I disagree that this proposal has a high probability of successful implementation.
f6_assessments.q2:
Deliverables are not quantized  nor qualitized.
Roadmap is only basic without clear member tasks.
Detailed KPI are not explained (only very basic ones).

Based on the given info, I disagree that this proposal provides us with sufficient information to review its progress.
